summary: This is an email from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, providing staff rosters for August 8-10, 2019, and noting a correction regarding an officer's title. The document appears to be routine administrative communication from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: T. Noel
persons.context: Listed as a Morning Watch Officer on the staff rosters for the specified dates at MCC New York.

persons.name: M. Thomas
persons.context: Identified in a correction note; originally may have been listed with an incorrect title (Senior Officer).

events.title: Staff Roster Period
events.description: Administrative rosters for correctional staff at MCC New York were issued covering Thursday through Saturday.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, which is the day after Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at MCC New York.
It is routine administrative correspondence from an Associate Warden regarding staff assignments.
The email includes a correction about an officer's title, indicating it was sent with attention to detail.
The location is the MCC New York facility, which is central to the Epstein case due to his detention and death there.
